options.text: Selecting 'Yes' here will cause the template to provision Prometheus and Grafana with scaling rules to enable horizontal pod auto-scaling.

elements.name: enableautoScaling
elements.label: Enable auto scaling?
elements.toolTip: Select 'Yes' and provide required info to configure the connection to Prometheus and Grafana.

options.text: Prometheus rules allow you to define alert conditions based on Prometheus expression language expressions and to send notifications about firing alerts to the scaling service.

elements.name: wlsPrometheusRules
elements.label: Prometheus rules for WebLogic cluster scaling
elements.defaultValue:
- record: webapp:webapp_config_open_sessions_current_count:avg
   expr: avg(webapp_config_open_sessions_current_count{webapp="myapp2"})
- alert: scaleup
   for: 1m
  expr: webapp:webapp_config_open_sessions_current_count:avg > 10
  annotations:
  description: 'Scale up when current sessions is greater than 15.'
  summary: 'Firing when total sessions active greater than 15.'
- alert: scaledown
   for: 1m
   expr: webapp:webapp_config_open_sessions_current_count:avg < 4
   annotations:
   description: 'Scale down when current sessions is less than 4.'
   summary: 'Firing when total sessions active less than 4'
elements.toolTip: Define the scaling up and scaling down rules.

elements.label: Alert name for scaling up
elements.toolTip: Use only allowed characters

constraints.validationMessage: Only alphanumeric characters are allowed, and the value must be 1-30 characters long.

elements.name: alertNameForScaleDown
elements.label: Alert name for scaling down
elements.toolTip: Use only allowed characters

constraints.validationMessage: Only alphanumeric characters are allowed, and the value must be 1-30 characters long.
